bioconda.name: admixtools
bioconda.summary: ADMIXTOOLS (Patterson et al. 2012) is a software package that supports formal tests of whether admixture occurred, and makes it possible to infer admixture proportions and dates.

biocontainers.name: admixtools
biocontainers.summary: ADMIXTOOLS (Patterson et al. 2012) is a software package that supports formal tests of whether admixture occurred, and makes it possible to infer admixture proportions and dates.

biotools.summary: Implements five methods to analyze admixture: the three-population test, D-statistics, F4-ratio estimation, admixture graph fitting, and rolloff. In addition, it computes lower and upper bounds on admixture proportions based on f3-statistics. Contains 6 programs: convertf, qp3Pop, qpBound, qpDstat, qpF4Ratio, and rolloff.

bioschemas.name: AdmixTools
bioschemas.summary: Implements five methods to analyze admixture: the three-population test, D-statistics, F4-ratio estimation, admixture graph fitting, and rolloff. In addition, it computes lower and upper bounds on admixture proportions based on f3-statistics. Contains 6 programs: convertf, qp3Pop, qpBound, qpDstat, qpF4Ratio, and rolloff.
